Name: La Cucina di Donna Carmela
Street: contrada Grotte 7, località Carruba di Riposto
Description: Enjoy Sicilian specialities and the best produce from the hotel’s orchards and vegetable garden. Dine in a welcoming dining room or on the attractive outdoor terrace in the shade of the palm trees...
